name: Useless Ninja
description:
Use W to Jump

A to move to right , D to Move left 

E and Q to shoot the Kunai 

Its about a Ninja, Who lives in modern era and had nothing to do. Ninjas are professional killers. but in modern era no one is hiring him . he has no family and he is unemployed.so to survive he started stealing from other people. and for fun in life he began to make new enemies for no reason. after a few years he became the most wanted criminal in his area. and he just started stealing for fun. so basically he's a bad guy in this game. and the others are good people. who is trying to catch him and throw him into jail.
